event.title: is located in the region of the city which is now

data.event: It is located in the region of the city which is now colloquially known as the "Bible Belt" due to the large number of people who have settled there to be close to Christian schools and churches.
It was named in 1967, after the Queensland governor of the time Sir Alan Mansfield.

event.title: recorded a population of 8,473 at the 2011

data.event: The suburb recorded a population of 8,473 at the 2011 Australian Census.
